FuncDef: The display garp statistics command displays GARP statistics on a specific or all interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays GARP statistics on a specific interface:
<ifType> specifies the type of the interface.<ifNum> specifies the number of the interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After GARP is enabled on a device's interface, the device automatically records statistics about GARP PDUs sent, received, and discarded if any. To check the statistics, run the display garp statistics command. The statistics help determine whether GARP is functioning properly.
If the parameter interface is not specified in the command, GARP statistics on all interfaces are displayed.If the parameter interface is specified in the command, GARP statistics on a specific interface are displayed.
